template.name: Template App Apache by HTTP
template.description:
Get metrics from mod_status module using HTTP agent. https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/mod_status.html
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/384764-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-apache
Template tooling version used: 0.34

item.name: Apache: Total bytes
item.description: Total bytes served

item.name: Apache: Bytes per second
item.description: Calculated as change rate for 'Total bytes' stat. BytesPerSec is not used, as it counts average since last Apache server start.

item.name: Apache: Get status
item.description: Getting data from a machine-readable version of the Apache status page. https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/mod_status.html

trigger.name: Apache: Failed to fetch status page (or no data for 30m)
trigger.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes.

item.name: Apache: Total requests
item.description: A total number of accesses

item.name: Apache: Requests per second
item.description: Calculated as change rate for 'Total requests' stat. ReqPerSec is not used, as it counts average since last Apache server start.

item.name: Apache: Uptime
item.description: Service uptime in seconds

item.name: Apache: Version
item.description: Service version

trigger.name: Apache: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Apache version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: Apache: Workers idle cleanup
item.description: Number of workers in cleanup state

item.name: Apache: Workers closing connection
item.description: Number of workers in closing state

item.name: Apache: Workers DNS lookup
item.description: Number of workers in dnslookup state

item.name: Apache: Workers finishing
item.description: Number of workers in finishing state

item.name: Apache: Workers keepalive (read)
item.description: Number of workers in keepalive state

item.name: Apache: Workers logging
item.description: Number of workers in logging state

item.name: Apache: Workers reading request
item.description: Number of workers in reading state

item.name: Apache: Workers sending reply
item.description: Number of workers in sending state

item.name: Apache: Workers slot with no current process
item.description: Number of slots with no current process

item.name: Apache: Workers starting up
item.description: Number of workers in starting state

item.name: Apache: Workers waiting for connection
item.description: Number of workers in waiting state

item.name: Apache: Total workers busy
item.description: Total number of busy worker threads/processes

item.name: Apache: Total workers idle
item.description: Total number of idle worker threads/processes

trigger.name: Apache: Service response time is too high (over {$APACHE.RESPONSE_TIME.MAX.WARN}s for 5m)

discovery_rule.name: Event MPM discovery
discovery_rule.description: Additional metrics if event MPM is used https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/event.html

item_prototype.name: Apache: Bytes per request
item_prototype.description: Average number of client requests per second

item_prototype.name: Apache: Connections async closing
item_prototype.description: Number of async connections in closing state (only applicable to event MPM)

item_prototype.name: Apache: Connections async keep alive
item_prototype.description: Number of async connections in keep-alive state (only applicable to event MPM)

item_prototype.name: Apache: Connections async writing
item_prototype.description: Number of async connections in writing state (only applicable to event MPM)

macro.description: Maximum Apache response time in seconds for trigger expression
The port of Apache status page
Request scheme which may be http or https
